data.name: XCarnival
data.description:
What’s XCarnival?

XCarnival is an aggregator for synthetic decentralized finance (DeFi) assets that provides the masses on-chain exposure to a wide variety of crypto and non-crypto assets. 

The protocol is based on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and also provides multi-chain solutions to users as it is in the process of deploying on Polygon and Solana protocols. 

It provides easy-to-use financial products for users to create synthetic assets in DeFi, and it also creates more liquidity in the DeFi market by allowing users to pledge and borrow with their NFT assets without having to sell them. By doing so, XCarnival solves the problems of poor liquidity in the NFT space and also make the best use of long-tail assets. 

The platform aims to bring the mass audience to the DeFi synthetic market by making the products easily accessible for everyone, and introducing a wide range of assets, including crypto, non-crypto, financial and non-financial assets, to the users.
